name: Catventure! - Amazing cat's adventure
description:
In this game your only mission is to stay alive as  long as possible. To do this you must monitor your stats and look for the best way to get to the resources you need.

For successful survival, you must follow three indicators::

-Health

-Energy

-Wetting level

If you run out of energy, find food, avoiding obstacles, if your cat is wet, dry it under the wind currents and in any case do not bring the health level to zero, otherwise the game will end!

As the game progresses, you can find treasures and open up amazing new skins and hats. The further you go, the greater the reward in the chests will be!
